ygData.subject: RE: Re: [EverQuest] New expansion Beta Open
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all I was just wondering how much Everquest has changed since November (last time I was able to log in) last year expansion-wise.  This new expansion I m
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all I was just wondering how much Everquest has changed since November
(last time I was able to log in) last year expansion-wise. This new
expansion I'm hearing about sounds interesting. BTW I'm currently on
deployment and have no internet access.


-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 06, 2005 4:31 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] New expansion Beta Open


I can't even get into the normal game. I keep trying and all I get is 1017
all the time. I may have to cancel my accounts if this keeps up. No point in
paying for a game I can't play.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-04, 20:12:00 you wrote: =======

>Well I'd love to tell ya if I could ever get into the damn thing! It's
till not working for me!
> From the small bit I did see, they've added 2 new tabs to the Inventory
window. One says Evolving Weapons, and the other one says Monster Alts.
The latest patch message I saw said that the monster alts was not working
yet. And some NPCs whose character models are not in zone yet are replaced
by the standard human model. They call this model "Doug".
>
>
>Wulfric
>
